noteText: Block 7 Chardonnay. I see white powder on upper leaf surfaces, moderate spread after two warm days. Leaves are dry right now, slight musty odor, wind feels light. Log this and give me a spray window tonight.

symptoms: white powder on upper leaf surfaces

noteText: Block 3 Pinot Noir. A few small white spots just starting on lower leaves, looks very early stage. Dry canopy, no wind. Possible early powdery mildew.

symptoms: small white spots on lower leaves

noteText: Block 12 Cabernet. Heavy powdery mildew everywhere, white coating covering most leaves and some clusters. Severe spread, leaves curling. Dry, calm conditions.

symptoms: white coating covering most leaves and some clusters

noteText: Block 5 Chardonnay. Midday leaf curl and wilting on south-facing rows, heat stress from the hot afternoon. Temperature feels around 38C. Leaves are dry, moderate wind.
Block 9 Merlot. Severe wilting across entire block, leaves are scorched and brown at edges. Extreme heat damage after three consecutive days above 40C. Dry, strong wind.

symptoms: leaves scorched and brown at edges

noteText: I see something wrong with the vines but not sure what it is. Leaves look a bit off.
Block 4 Chardonnay. Some white patches that could be moderate or maybe high severity. Powder on leaf surfaces but not everywhere. Dry conditions, light wind.
Block 2 Sauvignon Blanc. Powdery mildew on upper canopy, moderate spread. Also noticed the drip line might be clogged in row 14. Dry leaves, calm wind.
Block 6 Chardonnay. White powder on upper leaf surfaces, moderate spread. Leaves dry, slight breeze.

symptoms: white powder on upper leaf surfaces

noteText: uh... something... block... yeah the grapes look bad I think
